name: The Binding Of YOU
description: The Binding of you is a rogue-like, story about you as an ice cold human being fighting your inner demons to escape the torment they bestow upon you and find happiness at the end of your journey
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: i3 Graphics: Standard HD graphics Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: standard sound card or motherboard sound port Additional Notes: Game runs in locked 60fps
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: i5 Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 or radeon equivalent Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: standard sound card or motherboard sound port Additional Notes: Game runs in locked 60fps
